title: Shyvana: "What do you get when a draogn sneezes?"
body:
http://i.imgur.com/lih0k7k.gif

{{champion:102}} "Out of the way."

(Bad post I know. But I wanted to post this gif.)

(EDIT: Misspelled the title when I was hyper typing. Too late to change it now.)

replies.body:
{{champion:131}} "A man, a woman and a yordle walk into the sun... They die. Because it burns them alive."
https://media.giphy.com/media/x7plV6bC5IWOc/giphy.gif

Honestly, I never understood that one.
Is that some sort of a pun or a quote?
it means that when a dragon(draogn) sneezes you're supposed to get out of the way

Meh, so there is no deep meaning there.

In this case I like the localized version better.
Translates to something like:

"_What should you do when a dragon puffs? Sizzle._"
What is this draogn you speak of?
Which one is it? Looks familiar but I'm not sure...
Ok, it was the movie I was thinking about. It's been a while since I've seen it.

I don't know what a draogn is. should I be scared? clearly i need to get out of the way if it sneezes.

also, and i hate to do this, but i need people to proliferate this mode I made, so here is link.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/E6tTagL6-an-interesting-custom-game-concept-runebattle
